posts.post_content:
Two Southern League players in well loved PSA 1 condition are offered for your consideration.

Ray Ryan -  a catcher and teammate of Shag on the 1909 Roanoke Tigers - is SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10563/ryan-sl[/IMG]

And J F Kiernan - an outfielder and George Manion's teammate on the Columbia Gamecocks.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10454/kiernan-sl[/IMG]

Still available Kiernan can be delivered to you for $43 shipped. 

Any form of payment is fine, but I do ask for an additional three percent for regular Paypal.;)
